pages.text: The $(5)Block Access Module$() is an optional module for the $(l:mffs:machines/interdiction_matrix)Interdiction Matrix$(). It enables a Matrix to inhibit a player's ability to right-click on a block and access its GUI screen.

pages.title: Operation
pages.text: If an unauthorized player tries to right-click a block or machine located within the action range of an Interdiction Matrix (equipped with the $(5)Block Access Module$()), they will not be permitted to open its GUI. As we would expect, blocks or machines outside the action area can be used normally.
